description.narrative: 1. Increasing access to finance in low income states in India, including states in the northern and eastern parts of the country which have amongst the highest population densities and poverty rates in the country 2. Promoting a more balanced growth of microfinance by supporting an institution that been a front-runner in adopting technology, is a pioneer in focusing on consumer service and responsible financing and offers customized products for various financial and non financial needs of its members

IFC proposes to invest in Ujjivan Financial Services Private Limited (Ujjivan or the Company), which is a leading Microfinance Institution (MFI) in India. Ujjivan is amongst the few large MFIs that focus on providing micro loans to women borrowers in urban and semi-urban areas. Its target customers include self-employed women working as vegetable or fruit vendors, small shop owners, sari sellers, tailors etc; salaried women working in garment factories, hospitals, cooks, house maids, and piece rate workers involved in incense stick rolling, tailoring etc. Ujjivan today has about 1.1 million members and a loan portfolio of about US$140 million equivalent. Ujjivan has over the years, established itself as one of the most customer centric institutions with a strong emphasis on responsible lending and good HR practices. The proposed project intends to help Ujjivan fund its expansion and carry out strategic & operational changes in order to cope with the changed regulatory and business environment, and meet its regulatory capital adequacy requirements for the next 3-5 years.

name.narrative: Ujjivan operates through 299 branches in 20 Indian states. The states it operates in include: Assam, Bihar, Jharkhand, Meghalaya, Orissa, West Bengal, Chandigarh, Haryana, New Delhi, Punjab, Rajasthan, Uttar Pradesh, Uttarakhand, Goa, Karnataka, Kerala, Pondicherry, Tamilnadu, Gujarat, and Maharashtra. The Company is headquartered in Bangalore, in the state of Karnataka. Ujjivan operates in urban and semi urban areas and has close to 3,800 employees.
